Status.Meaning: A collection was invalid or one of the specified collection IDs was invalid.
Status.Cause: One or more of the specified folders does not exist or an incorrect folder was requested.
Status.Resolution: Item Issue a FolderSync command (section 2.2.2.5) to get the new hierarchy. Then retry with a valid collection or collection ID

Status.Meaning: The synchronization state has not been primed.
Status.Cause: The client has issued a GetItemEstimate command without first issuing a Sync command request (section 2.2.2.21) with an airsync:SyncKey element (section 2.2.3.180.4) value of zero (0).
Status.Resolution: Issue a Sync command with synchronization key of zero (0) before issuing the GetItemEstimate command again.

Status.Meaning: The specified synchronization key was invalid.
Status.Cause: Malformed or mismatched synchronization key. —or— The synchronization state is corrupted on the server.
Status.Resolution: Issue a successful Sync command prior to issuing the GetItemEstimate command again. If the error is repeated, issue a Sync command with an airsync:SyncKey element value of zero (0).
